column4: Need help!!! I am a beginner. dont now comand for terminal how to copy ALSA to specified dir.     https://help.ubuntu.com/community/HdaIntelSoundHowto
you mean "sudo cp /home/naaman/installers/alsa/* ."? (watch out the trailing dot)
No befor that it the tutorial indicates that you shood copy     alsa-driver     alsa-lib     alsa-utils   to /home/naaman/installers/alsa how do i do that it dosen't let me drag and drop?
the file manager (nautilus) should let you drag and drop files ... just create a directory and put those file into it
